text: John C. Brenden was a Republican member of the Montana Legislature. He was elected for Senate District 18, representing Scobey, Montana in the 2009 and 2011 sessions. Due to redistricting he served District 17 from 2013 to 2016. He had previously served in 1993. Brenden received a BA from Concordia College in Political Science/Philosophy. He currently owns Brenden Farms. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Montana Republicans Category:Montana state senators Category:People from Scobey, Montana Category:2008 United States presidential electors Category:2012 United States presidential electors Category:1941 births Category:21st-century American politicians Category:Concordia College (Moorhead, Minnesota) alumni
title: John Brenden
